item.description: Excited to collaborate w/ @theNasem on release of the Toolkit for Fostering Open Science Practices. Actionable guidance on building incentive structures to nurture & reward #OpenScience, #OpenAccess, #OpenData. Toolkit is CC BY - adapt & adopt it! More: https://t.co/x94YtHYCSN

item.title: #en @ 1443642574691045379
item.description:
Have you ever used Web Scraping and Web Crawling techniques to collect data? they are very cool and useful, right?
But have you ever thought about the privacy implications? Collecting anonymous or open data is not the same as collecting data that belongs to someone. Be careful!
